s.text: In that enterprise, a little economic theory goes a long way.
Do you dare wait that long?
If you choose to remain silent, you'll have to wait till after the election to collect your reward.
In other words, if the stories are true, then the Vietnamese got a fabulous bargain.
Then, assuming you can't get away with bogus accusations, your only option is to serve your time in silence.
Her silence means either that she knows nothing or that she knows enough to extract a high price for her silence.
If all your motives are selfish, you'll probably first make some discreet inquiries to determine whether the president is prepared to outbid the prosecutor--say with the promise of a full pardon.
